message: Let's split a bit more than half-half for me in this round, considering the money will be worth less later.
Considering the 10% inflation for me, I need a bit more than half to make up for it.
Bob, the longer this takes the less your share is worth.  I'm offering a bit more than last round to settle this quickly.
I'll compromise a bit, but I still need a larger share due to the increasing inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic.  The inflation is only hurting you. I'm offering an even split. Take it or leave it.
